</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company records a full valuation allowance against its net deferred tax assets since the Company cannot conclude that it was more likely than not that its deferred tax assets would be realized.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At December 31, 2016, the Company had federal and state income loss carryforwards of $75.7 million and $83.0 million, respectively, that begin to expire in 2032 for both federal and state purposes. Additionally, the Company has research and development credits and orphan drug credits of approximately $2.0 million and $7.3 million, respectively, available for federal purposes, which begin to expire in 2032 and 2036, respectively. The utilization of the federal net operating loss and credit carryforwards to reduce future income taxes will depend on the Company&#x2019;s ability to generate sufficient taxable income prior to the expiration of the carryforwards. In addition, the utilization of the federal net operating loss and credit carryforwards may be subject to limitations under the rules regarding a change in stock ownership as determined by the Internal Revenue Code and state laws. Section 382 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, imposes annual limitations on the utilization of net operating loss (&#x201C;NOL&#x201D;) carryforwards, other tax carryforwards and certain built-in losses upon an ownership change as defined by that section. In general terms, an ownership change may result from transactions that increase the aggregate ownership of certain stockholders in the Company stock by more than 50 percentage points over a three year testing period (&#x201C;Section 382 Ownership Change&#x201D;). If the Company has undergone a Section 382 Ownership change, an annual limitation would be imposed on certain tax attributes of the Company, including NOL and capital loss carryforwards and certain other losses and credits. As of December 31, 2016, the Company has not performed a formal study to determine whether there are Section 382 limitations that apply and such limitations could be significant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The difference between actual income tax rate for the years ended December 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, and the statutory federal income tax rate are as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As of December 31, 2016 and 2015, the Company had no unrecognized tax benefits. The Company has analyzed its filing positions in all significant federal and state jurisdictions where it is required to file income tax returns,
</FONT>

</DIV>

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage79"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#NVLS-20161231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as well as open tax years in these jurisdictions. With few exceptions, the Company is no longer subject to U.S. federal, state and local tax examinations by taxing authorities for years before 2013. No income tax returns are currently under examination by taxing authorities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10. Employment Benefit Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company outsources its payroll, benefits and human resource administration functions to a Professional Employer Organization (PEO). The Company&#x2019;s employees are eligible to participate in the PEO&#x2019;s Multiple Employer Retirement Savings Plan (401(k) plan). The 401(k) plan allows immediate participation by U.S. employees that are 20 years of age or older. Participants may defer up to 75% of their gross pay, up to a maximum limit determined by U.S. federal law. The Company provides all active employees with a safe harbor contribution equal to 3% of compensation (regardless of participation in the 401(k) plan) up to maximum U.S. federal law limits. These safe harbor contributions vest immediately. During 2016, 2015 and 2014, the Company paid approximately $150,000, &nbsp;$115,000 and $129,000, respectively, for employer contributions and plan expenses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11. Net Loss per Share
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company excluded the following common stock equivalents, outstanding as of the years ended December 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014, from the computation of diluted net loss per share for these same periods because they had an anti-dilutive impact on the computation:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-20
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage80"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 30PT;COLOR:#0563C1;LINE-HEIGHT:107.92%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<A HREF="#NVLS-20161231X10K_HTM_TOC">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;COLOR:#0563C1;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13. Subsequent Events
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In January 2017, following the failure of a Phase 2 trial of cavosonstat in patients with CF to meet its primary endpoint, the Company initiated a process to explore and review a range of strategic alternatives focused on maximizing stockholder value from its clinical assets and cash resources. As a result, the Company ceased its research activities and further development of cavosonstat and its other GSNOR inhibitors and began implementation of a workforce reduction of 25 positions&nbsp;to better align its workforce to its revised operating plan. The workforce reduction will be substantially completed during the first quarter of 2017, at which time the Company expects to have approximately five remaining employees. Cash payments in connection with the workforce reduction, comprised principally of severance and benefits continuation costs, are estimated to be approximately $3.0 million and expected to be paid during the first half of 2017.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In addition to severance payments, all unvested stock options held by employees affected by the workforce reduction were 100% vested and a portion of unvested RSUs held by one employee vested. As a result, the Company expects to record in the first quarter of 2017 approximately $2.3 million of stock-based compensation expense related to this accelerated vesting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company has not incurred, nor does it expect to incur, significant cancellation charges with its vendors as a result of winding down research and development activities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:24PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	F-21
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

	&nbsp;
</P>

</DIV>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;WIDTH:09.94%;PADDING:0PT;">

	101.DEF
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

	XBRL Taxonomy Extension Definition Linkbase Document
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Exhibit 10.10
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONFIDENTIAL SEPARATION AGREEMENT AND GENERAL RELEASE
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This Confidential Separation Agreement and General Release (this &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) is entered into by and between Nivalis Therapeutics, Inc. (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYER
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Jon Congleton
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	(&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYEE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this Agreement, EMPLOYER includes TriNet Group, Inc. (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TriNet
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) as well as any company related to EMPLOYER, in the past or present; the past and present officers, directors, employees, shareholders, attorneys, agents, insurers and representatives of EMPLOYER; any present or past employee benefit plan sponsored by EMPLOYER and/or the officers, directors, trustees, administrators, employees, attorneys, agents, insurers and representatives of such plan; and any person who acted on behalf of EMPLOYER or on instruction from EMPLOYER.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In exchange for the releases and other agreements specified in this Agreement, the parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	A.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S Separation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s last day of employment is January 15, 2017 (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Separation Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	B.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Separation Pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	EMPLOYEE acknowledges and agrees that EMPLOYEE has received all compensation and benefits to which EMPLOYEE is entitled through and including the Separation Date, including but not limited to wages and accrued but unused vacation/PTO time.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s compliance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement, EMPLOYER will provide EMPLOYEE with the additional benefits described below in exchange for EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S release of any and all claims EMPLOYEE may have against EMPLOYER. This Agreement is entered into as contemplated by the Employment Agreement between EMPLOYER and EMPLOYEE dated January 1, 2015 (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Employment Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	As consideration for EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S release of all claims against EMPLOYER, and in accordance with the terms of the Employment Agreement,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	and provided EMPLOYEE complies with his/her obligations under this Agreement and the NDA (as defined below)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	: (i)&nbsp;EMPLOYER will pay EMPLOYEE the gross sum of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Six Hundred Seventy-Five Thousand dollars
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	($675,000.00)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	, less applicable Federal, state and local tax withholdings and other amounts required by law to be withheld (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Separation Pay
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), (ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	provided that EMPLOYEE is eligible and timely elects continuation of his/her health insurance pursuant to COBRA, an amount necessary to reimburse EMPLOYEE for the cost of COBRA premiums to be paid in order for EMPLOYEE to maintain medical insurance coverage through January 15, 2018 that is substantially equivalent to that which EMPLOYEE received immediately prior to the Separation Date less the amount paid by EMPLOYEE immediately prior to the Separation Date for EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S contribution to premiums for EMPLOYER&#x2019;S health insurance,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	provided, however
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	, that EMPLOYER&#x2019;S obligation to pay EMPLOYEE COBRA premiums will cease immediately in the event EMPLOYEE becomes eligible for group health insurance prior to January 15, 2018, and EMPLOYEE agrees to promptly notify EMPLOYER if EMPLOYEE becomes eligible to be covered by group health insurance in such event (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	COBRA Reimbursement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	&#x201D;); and (iii)&nbsp;all outstanding stock options held by EMPLOYEE shall vest and become exercisable in full as of the Effective Date (as defined in Section D.6 below) (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	Option Acceleration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11.5PT;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage84"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	The Separation Pay, COBRA Reimbursement and Option Acceleration is in addition to any and all other payments and benefits that may be owed to EMPLOYEE by EMPLOYER.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Separation Pay will be payable in eighteen substantially equal monthly installments payable on the last business day of each month following execution of this Agreement. The COBRA Reimbursement will be payable monthly following submission of evidence to EMPLOYER of payment of the COBRA premium by EMPLOYEE so long as EMPLOYEE is eligible to receive such reimbursement hereunder. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no payments will begin sooner than the first business day following expiration of the seven (7) day period following the Effective Date. EMPLOYEE authorizes EMPLOYER to pay the Separation Pay by direct deposit processed through the TriNet Employer Payroll System.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	In the event of a closing of a Change in Control (as defined in the Employment Agreement) prior to expiration of EMPLOYER&#x2019;s obligations to pay the Separation Pay or the COBRA Reimbursement hereunder, EMPLOYER will pay EMPLOYEE (i) the remaining amount of the aggregate Separation Pay and (ii) the amount of the remaining COBRA Reimbursements plus an amount equal to EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s estimated income tax obligation payable, using a flat rate of 32%, as a result of the payment in advance of the amount of such remaining COBRA Reimbursement, if any, in each case a single lump sum payment to EMPLOYEE on or immediately after consummation of such Change in Control.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 46.5PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	C.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S General Release of EMPLOYER
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;In exchange for the consideration set forth in this Agreement, EMPLOYEE, on behalf of EMPLOYEE and his/her heirs, executors, representatives, successors and assigns, fully and completely releases and forever discharges EMPLOYER from any and all claims, demands, damages, losses, obligations, rights and causes of action of every kind and nature whatsoever, whether known or unknown, which EMPLOYEE has had, now has, or may have against EMPLOYER at any time through the date EMPLOYEE signs this Agreement, with the exception of any claims that arise after execution of this Agreement, claims that cannot legally be waived, and claims for breach of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the limitations in the immediately preceding sentence, this general release of claims includes all claims arising under any Federal, state or local statute or ordinance, constitutional provision, public policy or common law, including claims under Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 and 1991, the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967, the Civil Rights Act of 1866, the Civil Rights Act of 1871, the Employee Retirement Income Security Act (solely with respect to unvested benefits), the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act, the Americans with Disabilities Act, the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Family Medical Leave Act, the Lilly Ledbetter Fair Pay Act of 2009, the Genetic Information Non-discrimination Act, the Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification Act, the Fair Credit Reporting Act, Colorado Anti-Discrimination Act (Colo. Rev. Stat. &#xA7; 24-34-401
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	et seq.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	), the Colorado Family Care Act (Colo. Rev. Stat. &#xA7; 8-13.3-201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	et. seq.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	), and workers&#x2019; compensation non-interference or non-retaliation statutes, all as amended; all claims arising under laws relating to violation of public policy, retaliation, or interference with legal rights; all claims arising under other employment or discrimination laws; all claims that a past unlawful decision has or has had a continuing effect on my compensation; all claims for compensation of any type whatsoever (including but not limited to claims for wages, bonuses, commissions, incentive compensation, vacation and/or severance); all claims arising under tort, contract and/or quasi-contract law; and all claims for monetary or equitable relief, including but not limited to attorneys&#x2019; fees, back pay, front pay, reinstatement, experts&#x2019; fees, medical fees or expenses, costs and disbursements.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	-2-
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	D.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S Specific ADEA Release of EMPLOYER
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;EMPLOYEE acknowledges and agrees that by entering into this Agreement, he/she is waiving any and all rights that he/she may have under the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967, as amended (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ADEA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;EMPLOYEE further expressly acknowledges and agrees that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	1.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	EMPLOYEE is entering into this Agreement voluntarily.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	2.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	EMPLOYEE understands and agrees that, by signing this Agreement, he/she is giving up any right to file legal proceedings against the EMPLOYER for any claims arising on or before the date EMPLOYEE signs this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;EMPLOYEE is not waiving (or giving up) rights or claims that may arise after the date EMPLOYEE signs this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	In return for this Agreement, EMPLOYEE will receive compensation that is in addition to any benefits to which he/she is already entitled to receive.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	4.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	EMPLOYEE is hereby advised in writing by this Agreement to consult with an attorney before signing this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	5.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	EMPLOYEE understands that he/she has had at least forty-five (45) calendar days from the day he/she received this Agreement, not counting the day upon which he/she received it, to consider whether he/she wishes to sign this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;If EMPLOYEE decides to sign this Agreement before the end of the forty-five (45) day period, which is solely EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s choice, EMPLOYEE represents that his/her decision is knowing and voluntary and that he/she has not been pressured to make a decision sooner.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	6.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 64.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	EMPLOYEE further understands that he/she may revoke (that is, cancel) this Agreement for any reason within seven (7) calendar days after signing it.&nbsp;&nbsp;EMPLOYEE agrees that the revocation must be in writing and hand-delivered or mailed to EMPLOYER.&nbsp;&nbsp;If mailed, the revocation must be postmarked within the seven (7) day period, properly addressed to Tom Sokolowski, VP Finance, Nivalis Therapeutics, Inc., 3122 Sterling Circle, Suite 200, Boulder, CO 80301; and sent by certified mail, return receipt requested. This Agreement will not be effective or enforceable until the eighth day after EMPLOYEE has signed this Agreement without having revoked it (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;EMPLOYEE understands that he/she will not receive any Separation Pay, the COBRA Reimbursement or the Option Acceleration if he/she revokes this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Agreement to Release Claims
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Except for an action brought to enforce this Agreement, actions which are not waivable as a matter of law or actions challenging the validity of EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s release of claims under the ADEA, EMPLOYEE agrees to refrain from initiating or participating in any proceeding of any kind against EMPLOYER relating to matters released in this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;If any such proceeding has been initiated by EMPLOYEE or on his/her behalf, EMPLOYEE shall use his/her best efforts to cause it immediately to be withdrawn and dismissed with prejudice.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, nothing in this Agreement prohibits EMPLOYEE
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	from filing a charge with or participating in an investigation or proceeding by the United States Equal Employment Opportunity Commission or any other governmental agency, from providing information to a governmental agency, or from participating in an investigation conducted by a governmental agency.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, EMPLOYEE understands and agrees that with the exception of money provided to EMPLOYEE by a governmental agency as an award for providing information, EMPLOYEE is not entitled to receive money or other relief (including any money damages, reinstatement or other legal or equitable relief) in connection with or on account of any of the claims released in this Agreement regardless of who initiated or filed the charge or other proceeding.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;By entering into this Agreement, EMPLOYER does not admit that it is legally obligated to make any payment of Separation Pay or COBRA Reimbursement to EMPLOYEE or to effect the Option Acceleration and denies that it is responsible or legally obligated for any claims or that it has engaged in any improper conduct or wrongdoing.

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Confidentiality of Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;EMPLOYEE agrees that EMPLOYEE will not disclose any of the terms of or amounts paid under this Agreement to any individual or entity; provided, however, that EMPLOYEE will not be prohibited from making disclosures to EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s attorneys, tax advisors and/or immediate family members, or as may be required or authorized by law or court order, or as may be necessary in providing truthful information to a government agency.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Return of EMPLOYER Property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;By no later than the Separation Date, EMPLOYEE shall (1) deliver to EMPLOYER all property belonging to EMPLOYER in EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s possession or control, including but not limited to all keys, access cards, credit cards, cell phones, computers, hard drives, flash drives, documents, and any other materials belonging to EMPLOYER (including but not limited to those that constitute or contain any trade secrets or confidential information), together with all copies of the foregoing; and (2) delete all electronically stored information containing any trade secrets or confidential information stored on any networks, computers or information storage devices not owned by EMPLOYER that are within EMPLOYEE&#x2019;s possession or control.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-disparagement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;EMPLOYEE agrees not to make, publish or communicate to any person or entity or in any public forum (including social media) at any time any defamatory remarks, comments or statements concerning EMPLOYER.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, this paragraph does not, in any way, restrict or impede EMPLOYEE from exercising protected rights to the extent that such rights cannot be waived by agreement or from complying with any applicable law or court order.
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Interpretation of Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement should be interpreted as broadly as possible to achieve EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S intention to resolve all of EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S claims against EMPLOYER.&nbsp;&nbsp;If this Agreement is held by a court to be inadequate to release a particular claim, this Agreement will remain in full force and effect with respect to all of the rest of my released claims.
</FONT>

	Severability

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;If any provision of this Agreement is declared by any court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid for any reason, such invalidity shall not affect the remaining provisions of this Agreement, which shall be fully severable, and given full force and effect.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;Regardless of whether EMPLOYEE signs this Agreement, EMPLOYEE has continuing obligations under his/her Proprietary Information and Inventions Agreement and Noncompete Agreement (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	NDA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) and EMPLOYEE acknowledges and affirms such continuing obligations under the provisions of the NDA, which shall survive termination of EMPLOYEE&#x2019;S employment.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	N.
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Entire Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;This Agreement is the complete understanding between the parties regarding the subject matter of this Agreement and supersedes all prior agreements relating to the same subject matter.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">

	AMENDMENT to the
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	between

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Nivalis Therapeutics,&nbsp;Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Janice M. Troha (&#x201C;Employee&#x201D;)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	WHEREAS, Nivalis Therapeutics,&nbsp;Inc. (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) and the Employee entered into an employment agreement (the &#x201C;Agreement&#x201D;) effective as of November 1, 2012, as amended;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	WHEREAS, the Company and the Employee desire to amend the Agreement to change the provision relating to accelerated vesting of stock options in connection with Termination/Severance;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the promises and mutual covenants contained herein and for other good and valuable consideration, the parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 20.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;">
	1.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:16PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:16PT;WIDTH:16PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	A new Section 5(e) shall be inserted in the Agreement as follows and the sections currently designated as Section 5(e), 5(f), 5(g) and 5(h), and all cross references in the Agreement thereto, shall be amended to be designated as Section 5(f), 5(g), 5(h) and 5(i), respectively:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(e)
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 26.1PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	The Employee may terminate this Agreement upon at least thirty (30) days&#x2019; notice for Good Reason. &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Good Reason
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#x201D; means (A) a ten percent (10%) or more reduction in Employee&#x2019;s salary to which Employee has not consented; (B) a material diminution in Employee&#x2019;s authority, duties or responsibilities without Employee&#x2019;s consent (which shall not include a change in reporting obligations resulting from a Corporate Transaction); (C) a requirement by the Company, without Employee&#x2019;s consent, that Employee&#x2019;s primary work site be relocated to a site that is more than twenty five (25) miles away from Employee&#x2019;s work site prior to the Corporate Transaction; or (D) any other action or inaction that constitutes a material breach by the Company of Employee&#x2019;s employment agreement, if any.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, a termination of Employee for Good Reason shall not have occurred unless (i) Employee gives written notice to the Company, of termination within thirty (30) days after Employee first becomes aware of the occurrence of the circumstances constituting Good Reason, specifying in reasonable detail the circumstances constituting Good Reason, (ii) the Company has failed within thirty (30) days after receipt of such notice to cure the circumstances constituting Good Reason, and (iii) Employee terminates employment within five (5) days after the Company&#x2019;s cure period ends.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 20.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:#FFFFFF;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;">
	2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:16PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:16PT;WIDTH:16PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Section 5(f) (as newly designated pursuant to Section 1 of this Amendment) is amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If this Agreement is terminated by the Company prior to the end of the term pursuant to any provision other than 5(a)&nbsp;or 5(c),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	or by the Employee pursuant to Section 5(e),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;">
	then (i)&nbsp;the Company shall pay to Employee twelve (12) month&#x2019;s salary, or the amount due Employee through the remainder of the term, whichever is greater, in equal monthly installments, subject to all applicable deductions and withholdings; (ii)&nbsp;the Company shall provide Employee with paid COBRA benefits during the twelve-month period following the Termination Date; and (iii)&nbsp;the Company shall cause any issued but unvested options scheduled to vest in the year of termination to immediately vest in full.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Re: Retention Bonus
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Dear Janice:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In recognition of your continued service with Nivalis Therapeutics, Inc. (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), and subject to the other terms and conditions of this letter agreement (this &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), we are pleased to offer you a retention bonus in the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	$100,000.00,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	less applicable withholdings and deductions required by law (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Retention Bonus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) and an option grant to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	200,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Common Stock of the Company which option shall vest in full upon the termination of your employment by the Company other than for Cause or a Corporate Transaction (as defined in the stock option agreement to be entered into by you and the Company) and be subject to the terms and conditions of such stock option agreement and the Company&#x2019;s 2015 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Stock Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Retention Bonus will be processed and paid through the Company&#x2019;s payroll on the closing date of a Change in Control (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payment Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), provided you have remained actively and continuously employed in good standing by the Company through the Payment Date. For purposes of this Agreement, &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Change in Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall mean&nbsp;the sale of all or substantially all of the outstanding shares of capital stock, assets or business of the Company, by merger, consolidation, sale of assets or otherwise (other than a transaction in which all or substantially all of the persons who were beneficial owners of the capital stock of the Company immediately prior to such transaction beneficially own, directly or indirectly, more than 50% of the outstanding voting securities (on an as-converted to Common Stock basis) of the resulting, surviving or acquiring entity in such transaction).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -9.35PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In order to be considered in &#x201C;good standing,&#x201D; you must have been employed continuously from the date hereof to the Payment Date and you must not be the subject of any disciplinary warning, whether written or oral.&nbsp;&nbsp;In order to receive the Retention Bonus, you must (a) be in good standing, (b) execute a release of claims to be provided to you by the Company, and (c) otherwise comply with the terms and conditions of this letter and the Company&#x2019;s policies and procedures.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -9.35PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Neither the Retention Bonus, the Stock Option grant nor this letter have any bearing on your right to employment with the Company.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Your employment remains at-will, meaning that you and the Company may terminate the employment relationship at any time, with or without cause or
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage92"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -9.35PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	reason, and with or without notice.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;For clarity, should your employment terminate for any reason other than by the Company without cause (as defined in the employment agreement between you and the Company) prior to the Payment Date, you will not receive the Retention Bonus and the vesting of the Stock Option shall cease.&nbsp;&nbsp;Compensation paid pursuant to this Agreement is intended to be exempt from, Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, as a short term deferral.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This letter supersedes in their entirety any prior or contemporaneous agreements between you and the Company regarding retention bonuses or payments, whether written, oral, express or implied.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This Agreement may not be amended or modified unless in writing signed by both you and an authorized officer of the Company. This Agreement, for all purposes, shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Colorado without regard to conflicts-of-law principles.
</FONT>
</P>

</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	WHEREAS, Nivalis Therapeutics,&nbsp;Inc. (the &#x201C;Company&#x201D;) and the Employee entered into an employment agreement (the &#x201C;Agreement&#x201D;) effective as of January&nbsp;21, 2015;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">

	&nbsp;

</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	WHEREAS, the Company and the Employee desire to amend the Agreement to change the provision relating to accelerated vesting of stock options in connection with Termination/Severance;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	NOW, THEREFORE, in consideration of the promises and mutual covenants contained herein and for other good and valuable consideration, the parties agree as follows:

	1.

<TD STYLE="WIDTH:16PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:16PT;WIDTH:16PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	A new Section 5(e) shall be inserted in the Agreement as follows and the sections currently designated as Section 5(e), 5(f), 5(g) and 5(h), and all cross references in the Agreement thereto, shall be amended to be designated as Section 5(f), 5(g), 5(h) and 5(i), respectively:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(e)
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 26.1PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
	The Employee may terminate this Agreement upon at least thirty (30) days&#x2019; notice for Good Reason. &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Good Reason
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#x201D; means (A) a ten percent (10%) or more reduction in Employee&#x2019;s salary to which Employee has not consented; (B) a material diminution in Employee&#x2019;s authority, duties or responsibilities without Employee&#x2019;s consent (which shall not include a change in reporting obligations resulting from a Corporate Transaction); (C) a requirement by the Company, without Employee&#x2019;s consent, that Employee&#x2019;s primary work site be relocated to a site that is more than twenty five (25) miles away from Employee&#x2019;s work site prior to the Corporate Transaction; or (D) any other action or inaction that constitutes a material breach by the Company of Employee&#x2019;s employment agreement, if any.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, a termination of Employee for Good Reason shall not have occurred unless (i) Employee gives written notice to the Company, of termination within thirty (30) days after Employee first becomes aware of the occurrence of the circumstances constituting Good Reason, specifying in reasonable detail the circumstances constituting Good Reason, (ii) the Company has failed within thirty (30) days after receipt of such notice to cure the circumstances constituting Good Reason, and (iii) Employee terminates employment within five (5) days after the Company&#x2019;s cure period ends.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	(f) If this Agreement is terminated by the Company prior to the end of the term pursuant to any provision other than Sections 4, 5(a) or 5(c) or by the Employee pursuant to Section 5(e) (the &#x201C;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	In the event of a Change of Control, all outstanding options granted to Employee as of such event shall immediately vest (to the extent they are not already vested).&nbsp; For purposes of this Agreement,&nbsp;&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Change in Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#x201D; shall mean&nbsp;the sale of all or substantially all of the outstanding shares of capital stock, assets or business of the Company, by merger, consolidation, sale of assets or otherwise (other than a transaction in which all or substantially all of the persons who were beneficial owners of the capital stock of the Company immediately prior to such transaction beneficially own, directly or indirectly, more than 50% of the outstanding voting securities (on an as-converted to Common Stock basis) of the (i)&nbsp;resulting, surviving or acquiring entity in such transaction in the case of a merger, consolidation or sale of outstanding shares, or (ii)&nbsp;acquiring entity in the case of a sale of assets).&nbsp; Notwithstanding the foregoing, sale of Company stock pursuant to an initial public offering or follow-on public offering shall not constitute a Change in Control.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 72PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Exhibit 10.18
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Nivalis Therapeutics, Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	3122 Sterling Circle, Suite 200, Boulder, CO 80301
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	January 9, 2017
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	R. Michael Carruthers
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Nivalis Therapeutics, Inc.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	3122 Sterling Circle
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Suite 200
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Boulder, Colorado 80301
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Re: Retention Bonus
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Dear Mike:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In recognition of your continued service with Nivalis Therapeutics, Inc. (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), and subject to the other terms and conditions of this letter agreement (this &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), we are pleased to offer you a retention bonus in the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	$100,000.00,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	less applicable withholdings and deductions required by law (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Retention Bonus
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) and an option grant to purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	200,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	shares of Common Stock of the Company which option shall vest in full upon the termination of your employment by the Company other than for Cause or a Corporate Transaction (as defined in the stock option agreement to be entered into by you and the Company) and be subject to the terms and conditions of such stock option agreement and the Company&#x2019;s 2015 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Stock Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;).&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	The Retention Bonus will be processed and paid through the Company&#x2019;s payroll on the closing date of a Change in Control (the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payment Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D;), provided you have remained actively and continuously employed in good standing by the Company through the Payment Date. For purposes of this Agreement, &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Change in Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&#x201D; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall mean&nbsp;the sale of all or substantially all of the outstanding shares of capital stock, assets or business of the Company, by merger, consolidation, sale of assets or otherwise (other than a transaction in which all or substantially all of the persons who were beneficial owners of the capital stock of the Company immediately prior to such transaction beneficially own, directly or indirectly, more than 50% of the outstanding voting securities (on an as-converted to Common Stock basis) of the resulting, surviving or acquiring entity in such transaction).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -9.35PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	In order to be considered in &#x201C;good standing,&#x201D; you must have been employed continuously from the date hereof to the Payment Date and you must not be the subject of any disciplinary warning, whether written or oral.&nbsp;&nbsp;In order to receive the Retention Bonus, you must (a) be in good standing, (b) execute a release of claims to be provided to you by the Company, and (c) otherwise comply with the terms and conditions of this letter and the Company&#x2019;s policies and procedures.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -9.35PT 0PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Neither the Retention Bonus, the Stock Option grant nor this letter have any bearing on your right to employment with the Company.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Your employment remains at-will, meaning that you and the Company may terminate the employment relationship at any time, with or without cause or
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<HR ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE='BACKGROUND-COLOR:#000000; BORDER-WIDTH:0; COLOR:#000000; HEIGHT:2PT; LINEHEIGHT:0; WIDTH:100%;'>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage96"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:10.2941176470588%;MARGIN-RIGHT:10.2941176470588%;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -9.35PT 0PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	reason, and with or without notice.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;For clarity, should your employment terminate for any reason other than by the Company without cause (as defined in the employment agreement between you and the Company) prior to the Payment Date, you will not receive the Retention Bonus and the vesting of the Stock Option shall cease.&nbsp;&nbsp;Compensation paid pursuant to this Agreement is intended to be exempt from, Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, as a short term deferral.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This letter supersedes in their entirety any prior or contemporaneous agreements between you and the Company regarding retention bonuses or payments, whether written, oral, express or implied.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	This Agreement may not be amended or modified unless in writing signed by both you and an authorized officer of the Company. This Agreement, for all purposes, shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Colorado without regard to conflicts-of-law principles.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">
	Sincerely,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY:INLINE;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">

	NIVALIS THERAPEUTICS, INC.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN,TIMES,SERIF;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;">
